patx: when on the local file system, the html file and the video file need to be in the same directory
patx: when on server, .ogv needs to be mapped to video/ogg

Hixie - hsivonen : <video controls="controls" preload="metadata" src="file:///home/patx/Desktop/5496.ogv" width="800"></video>
so i cant do that?

generally speaking whether file:// works at all and how it works is really up to the browser -- but in most browsers, it'll only work if the video file is in the same directory as the HTML file, when you use file://
easiest solution is to just say src="5496.ogv" instead of saying file://... etc.
and just make sure they're in the same directory

not in a very pretty way
annevk: what was the root cause?
before when a diff was empty it would return an empty string
oh. an empty diff
apparently SVN changed and now something is at the top at all times leading my script to assume there was a diff and not finding a number and therefore throwing an error
so now I changed to a try / except where I try to find the number given a diff and if that fails I assume there was no diff
